author: hwright
msg: Expose the serial_only flag in each test suite which needs it, so that
run_tests.py knows how to properly execute these tests.
(Note: this doesn't have any tangible effect now, since run_tests.py isn't
currently passing the correct value for 'parallel' down to the test modules.)
(_run_py_test): Divine the serial_only flag from the test module, and
pass that to the test executor.

author: hwright
msg: * STATUS: Move some items around and update a note.

author: hwright
msg: Reverse-merge r877219, r877239 from trunk.  These were merged in r1033222 as a
result of my confusion over what was being proposed, and the various voting
(I thought the proposal was for Makefile.svn in tools, not our core Makefile.in.)
